Statute.Title: Sioux Valley Dakota Nation Governance Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Nation dakota de Sioux Valley, Loi sur la gouvernance de la)

Minister.Text: Introduced by Minister of Aboriginal Affairs and Northern Development

CIF.Text: CIF, 2014, c. 1, s. 20 in force on assent 04.03.2014; ss. 1 to 17 in force 01.07.2014 see SI/2014-51
